data.name: SOUL JANITOR
data.detailed_description:
In SOUL JANITOR you play as a janitor who was contracted into cleaning out an old thought to be abandoned warehouse. You quickly find out that there is much more to this warehouse than a few dirty bathrooms. Armed with only your spray bottle, you must fight your way through the warehouse to complete your contract and unravel the mysteries of the facility along the way.



Key Features:

- Explore a detailed environment

- Fight unique spirit enemies

- Solve puzzles and find tapes to unravel the mystery
data.about_the_game:
In SOUL JANITOR you play as a janitor who was contracted into cleaning out an old thought to be abandoned warehouse. You quickly find out that there is much more to this warehouse than a few dirty bathrooms. Armed with only your spray bottle, you must fight your way through the warehouse to complete your contract and unravel the mysteries of the facility along the way.



Key Features:

- Explore a detailed environment

- Fight unique spirit enemies

- Solve puzzles and find tapes to unravel the mystery
data.short_description: In SOUL JANITOR you play as a worker contracted into a night time janitorial job, but when you arrive you find out that your cleaning up more than just toliets. Armed with only your spray bottle fight your way through the facilities in order to complete your contract and escape the facility!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ?
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Visual Studio 2015 with C++ Tools component or later and Windows 10 SDK

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Xcode. Targeting Apple Silicon with IL2CPP scripting backend requires macOS Catalina 10.15.4 and Xcode 12.2 or newer
